definition[0]: a large number of bullets, rocks etc shot or thrown through the air at the same time
definition[1]: a lot of questions, insults, attacks etc that are all said or made at the same time
definition[2]: a hit in tennis, a kick in football etc when the player hits or kicks the ball before it touches the ground
definition[3]: to hit or kick a ball before it touches the ground, especially in tennis or football
definition[4]: if a large number of guns volley, they are all fired at the same time
